metadata.description: CVE database for Ethereum RPC implementations

geth.title: Geth DoS via malformed trie node
geth.description: Go Ethereum (Geth) before 1.10.9 allows a DoS attack through malformed trie node in the snap/1 protocol.
geth.impact: Remote attackers can cause denial of service by sending malformed snap/1 protocol messages
geth.recommendation: Update to Geth v1.10.9 or later immediately

geth.title: Geth consensus flaw in London hard fork
geth.description: Go Ethereum (Geth) before 1.10.8 contains a consensus flaw related to base fee calculation in the London hard fork.
geth.impact: Could lead to chain splits and consensus failures
geth.recommendation: Critical update required - upgrade to v1.10.8+ immediately

geth.title: Geth crash via malformed RLP
geth.description: Go Ethereum (Geth) before 1.9.24 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via malformed RLP data.
geth.impact: Remote denial of service through malformed network messages
geth.recommendation: Update to Geth v1.9.24 or later

geth.title: Geth memory exhaustion via large RPC requests
geth.description: Geth before 1.10.15 is vulnerable to memory exhaustion attacks via large RPC requests.
geth.impact: Memory exhaustion leading to node crash and service disruption
geth.recommendation: Upgrade to Geth v1.10.15 or configure request size limits

parity.title: Parity light client DoS vulnerability
parity.description: Parity Ethereum before 2.2.5-beta allows attackers to cause a denial of service via light client requests.
parity.impact: Denial of service through malformed light client requests
parity.recommendation: Update to Parity v2.2.5 or later

parity.title: OpenEthereum consensus vulnerability
parity.description: OpenEthereum (formerly Parity) before 3.1.1 contains a consensus vulnerability in transaction processing.
parity.impact: Potential consensus failures and chain splits
parity.recommendation: Immediate upgrade to OpenEthereum v3.1.1 required

besu.title: Besu DoS via malformed P2P messages
besu.description: Hyperledger Besu before 21.10.2 allows denial of service attacks via malformed P2P discovery messages.
besu.impact: Remote denial of service through P2P network messages
besu.recommendation: Update to Besu v21.10.2 or later

besu.title: Besu information disclosure via debug API
besu.description: Hyperledger Besu before 22.7.0 exposes sensitive information through debug API endpoints.
besu.impact: Information disclosure through debug API endpoints
besu.recommendation: Upgrade to Besu v22.7.0 or disable debug API in production

nethermind.title: Nethermind JSON-RPC DoS vulnerability
nethermind.description: Nethermind before 1.13.4 allows denial of service attacks via malformed JSON-RPC requests.
nethermind.impact: Denial of service through malformed JSON-RPC requests
nethermind.recommendation: Update to Nethermind v1.13.4 or implement request validation

erigon.title: Erigon state sync vulnerability
erigon.description: Erigon before 2.42.0 contains a vulnerability in state sync that could lead to incorrect state root calculation.
erigon.impact: Incorrect state synchronization potentially leading to consensus issues
erigon.recommendation: Critical update to Erigon v2.42.0 required for mainnet nodes

reth.title: Reth memory exhaustion via large requests
reth.description: Reth before 0.1.2 is vulnerable to memory exhaustion attacks through oversized RPC requests.
reth.impact: Memory exhaustion leading to service disruption
reth.recommendation: Update to Reth v0.1.2 or configure request size limits
